description: Public transport can be lovely. On my way to a skater-park I had to use the Metro. It is usually overcrowded but at this time I was able to sit next to a tall young man. I asked him if I can interview him. He was shy but he agreed. He comes from Slovakia and lives now in Prague. I asked him if he knows the “Fast money” shows on TV. He nodded and since he ensured me that he had no problem with girls stripping for money I asked him if he would show me his cock for 5.000. It took long to convince him. But finally he agreed. A few thousands crowns and a lot of talk later he was even willing to give a blow-job. Well, as you know me, I went on and invested a whole lot of money in the ass of this cutie. I cannot remember that I ever fucked such a tall boy before. Good job.
title: Czech Hunter 09
